locations.title: Love's Travel Stop
locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: The shower was very clean, well-maintained, and comfortable. Honestly, I didn‚Äôt expect this level of cleanliness at a truck stop. I was really satisfied.

Curtis Franklin should loose his job he forced us to buy another shower threatened to call the cops and walk in on my wife showering. Shower 5 has a broken lock and will not secure itself and anyone can just open the shower from the outside ‚Ä¶

This seems to be a pretty clean place . Showers are nice , but again only one towel . It‚Äôs really not cool bring back the two towels. The stores are very in consistent. We spend a lot of money for fuel . Most of us take a shower break ‚Ä¶

3 stars because waters hot and clean in the shower rooms but the dam water pressure consistency sucks and  the show rooms are keeped way to cold ...half of me was warm from the water while the other half was ice cold cause the room never ‚Ä¶

The appearance in the parking lot and at fuel pumps had me a little apprehensive about taking a shower here. However, the showers were very clean, and the water was hot. I did not get the standard greeting "Welcome to Loves" on entry.
Loves needs to update their app to show stores under renovation, if showers are down and if there are restrooms available. ‚Ä¶

Just filled up with fuel here in the hopes are getting a shower. Showers are closed and the washrooms are closed and no sign at the fuel tanks to let us know. Now I gotta go to another  Truck Stop and pay for my shower. I know you need to ‚Ä¶
I like stopping at loves and this was a let down mainly for the fact that nearly everything is shut down for construction. No showers bathrooms are a trailer in the parking lot. ‚Ä¶
Shower is always down but diesel pump never down
This place is a dump shower don‚Äôt work giant pot hole in the parking area another large pot hole in front of the cat scale. Tear your truck up here.

locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Shower heads need to be cleaned or replaced. Can tell most of the holes in the heads are blocked and no water comes put of many of the holes. Country pride staff and food was courteous and good. Shower Temps and pressure was otherwise good. ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ The laundry isn't bad, and the showers are not too old and they keep them clean for the most part. ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ I paid for a shower. The shower room was very clean and the towels were clean and plentiful. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ 5 PAY PARKING WAS AVAILABLE.  I DID NOT GET FUEL HERE. THE PRICE FOR IT SKYROCKET MONEY RIGHT OUT OF THE BANK FOR THOSE WHO DO. SHOWER ARE EXTREMELY HOMEY. THEY HAVE A HEAT LIGHT THAT'S ON A TIMER. THANK TA FOR THE SERVICES AND ‚Ä¶
If you are disabled and are thinking about getting a shower here dont bother...they are all upstairs and no elevator to accommodate disabled folks.  Guess another day without a shower.üòµ‚Äçüí´ ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ professional and friendly. Ate at Country Pride it was good. Got a spot about 21:00 on a Friday night. Was still a few left. Old school feel and crowd.  Way less chaotic than the Love‚Äôs around the corner. Shower pressure like a fire hose

‚Ä¶ employees are great. Always greeting me coming in and leaving, they're courteous. Great bunch. My biggest issue is with the showers. I know there's quite a few light fixtures in the showers. It still seems so dark. Plus the shower head ‚Ä¶
Small, old, and dirty. Got a shower, and the toilet seat still has urine on it. I wouldn't be mad if it was free, but it's not. Thats disgusting üòí ‚Ä¶

The shower facilities at the TA here are the CLEANEST and MOST COMFORTABLE I've used in ANY travel scenario, (even hotel stays!). The Country Pride restaurant on the first floor has the BEST SERVICE I could've ever asked for! I'm on my ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Had a shower, it was nice and clean.  Water was adequately hot.  Stopped into Country Pride, it was as expected.   The servers were very friendly. ‚Ä¶

locations.title: Flying J Travel Center
locations.content: Flying J Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Place is dirty had no food at 6:30 in the morning coffee was old and the towels that you shower with was on the floor in the men‚Äôs bathroom around the toilet disgusting

I've been a OTR truck driver for 6 years now and I take a shower every day or the next day! And never been to a Pilot's or Flying J's bathroom so clean before... "Lary" has been doing and amazing job at this Pilot and should be rewarded... ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ the warmer at 8:15pm and it was completely bare then I went in,in the am to get coffee and breakfast and it was the same thing.shower 4 the shower was running almost full tilt when I got in there and that is because it would not turn off.

Trying to figure out WHY no showers for several days. I Was told "problem with the hot water"  but when you use the sink to wash your hands it's hot... Hmmm get  your act together.  When you go home do you not have a hot shower? All we all ‚Ä¶
Not one deserves, bad treatment and they have no shower ready, wait a day for shower
My place to stop when coming back to Canada, lovely place, always parking, shower kept well clean highly recommend !

Good service with one or two exceptions. The food service in Denny's was good and the shower was ok but I went to the building in the very early hours to find only one person on visible duty, the coffee area was a complete mess because he ‚Ä¶

Looks good.
Hot shower.
showerReviews.uniqueId: Karolina Chary≈Ço GUGA Trucks_Looks_good._Hot_shower._3 months ago

showerReviews.reviewText: Took a shower, ate at Dennis, and had pot roast, green beans, and Mac n cheese from FlyingJ. The store is clean and has a good selection of snacks, kids toys, and about everything they normally do, but this one at least has filled shelves. ‚Ä¶
Looking üëÄ good clean shower ‚Ä¶
